Title: Verify Customer Registration with Valid Details
Description: Validate that a new customer can register successfully using all mandatory details.

Steps.Action: Given the user navigates to the registration page
When the user enters 'John' in the First name field
And enters 'Doe' in the Last name field
And enters valid date in the Date of Birth field
And enters the street address in the Street field
And enters postal code in the Postal code field
And enters city in the City field
And enters state in the State field
And selects a valid country from the Country dropdown
And enters valid phone number in the Phone field
And enters a valid email address in the Email address field
And enters a valid password in the Password field
And clicks the Register button
Then the system should display a success message or redirect to the login page
And the user should be able to log in using the same credentials

Summary: This test case verifies: validate that a new customer can register successfully using all mandatory details..

Title: Verify Customer Login with Valid Credentials
Description: Validate that a registered customer can log in successfully using valid credentials.

Steps.Action: Given the user navigates to the login page
When the user enters the registered email address in the Email field
And enters the valid password in the Password field
And clicks the Login button
Then the system should authenticate the user and redirect to the homepage or dashboard
And a welcome message with user's name should be visible on the homepage

Summary: This test case verifies: validate that a registered customer can log in successfully using valid credentials..

Title: Verify Adding Multiple Items to Cart and Checkout
Description: Validate that a logged-in customer can add multiple items (Combination Pliers and Pliers) to the cart and verify them during checkout.

Steps.Action: Given the user is on the dashboard page after successful login
When the user clicks on the 'Combination Pliers' product card
And clicks the 'Add to Cart' button for the Combination Pliers product
Then the system should confirm that the Combination Pliers item is added to the cart
When the user navigates back to the dashboard/home page
And clicks on the 'Pliers' product card
And clicks the 'Add to Cart' button for the Pliers product
Then the system should confirm that the Pliers item is added to the cart
When the user clicks on the Cart icon or navigates to the Checkout page
Then both 'Combination Pliers' and 'Pliers' should be visible in the cart summary
And the user should be able to proceed with checkout or payment

Summary: This test case verifies: validate that a logged-in customer can add multiple items (combination pliers and pliers) to the cart and verify them during checkout..
TestData: expected: Confirmation message 'Item added to cart'
expected: Both items listed with correct quantity and price
expected: Proceed to payment or confirm order button available

Title: Verify Search and Purchase Flow for “M4 Nuts”
Description: Validate that a logged-in customer can search for “M4 Nuts”, view its details, add it to the cart, and proceed to checkout.

Steps.Action: Given the user is on the dashboard page after successful login
When the user types “M4 Nuts” in the search bar
And presses Enter or clicks the search icon
Then the system should display search results containing the “M4 Nuts” product
When the user clicks on the “M4 Nuts” product tab or card
Then the product details page should open
When the user clicks the “Add to Cart” button on the product page
Then the system should confirm that “M4 Nuts” has been added to the cart
When the user navigates to the Cart page
Then the cart should display the “M4 Nuts” product with correct details
When the user clicks on the “Proceed to Checkout” button
Then the system should redirect to the checkout page showing the “M4 Nuts” item in order summary

Summary: This test case verifies: validate that a logged-in customer can search for “m4 nuts”, view its details, add it to the cart, and proceed to checkout..
TestData: expected: “M4 Nuts” product appears in search results
expected: Confirmation message “Item added to cart”
action: Click on Cart icon / Cart page
expected: “M4 Nuts” displayed with correct price and quantity
expected: Checkout page with “M4 Nuts” listed
